discovery_rule.name: Zfs Dataset discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discover ZFS fileset. Fileset names must contain a "/" else it's a zpool.

trigger_prototype.name: Less than {$ZFS_POOL_PERCENT_FREE_CRITICAL:"{#POOLNAME}"}% free space on zpool {#POOLNAME} on {HOST.NAME}
Less than {$ZFS_POOL_PERCENT_FREE_WARNING:"{#POOLNAME}"}% free space on zpool {#POOLNAME} on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.name: Version of ZoL is now {ITEM.VALUE} on {HOST.NAME}

graph.name: ZFS ARC cache hits by cache list
